to add links, anchor element <a></a>, attribute href, hyperetxt reference, target=_blank", so your link can open in a new window

Linking to relative page: <a href="./contact.html">Contact</a> ; The ./ in ./index.html tells the browser to look for the file in the current folder.

Linking At Will: Link on images <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Opuntia" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.Prickly_Pear_Closeup.jpg" alt="A red prickly pear fruit"/></a>

Programmers use two tools to visualize the relationship between elements: whitespace and indentation.

Comments begin with <!-- and end with -->. Any characters in between will be ignored by your browser., eg;<!-- This is a comment that the browser will not display. -->
